Producer: Ben Stiller, Stuart Cornfeld, Scott Rudin, Clayton Townsend, Jeff Mann
Screenwriter: Justin Theroux, Ben Stiller, John Hamburg, Nicholas Stoller
Production Co: Red Hour Films, Scott Rudin Productions
Rating: PG-13 (Crude and Sexual Content|Brief Strong Language|Scene of Exaggerated Violence)
Synopsis: Former models Derek Zoolander (Ben Stiller) and Hansel find themselves thrust back into the spotlight after living in seclusion for years. Invited to a major fashion event in Rome, the estranged friends are surprised to see how much the business has changed. Even more shocking is their encounter with Valentina Valencia, a special agent who needs their help. Someone is killing famous pop stars, and it's up to Derek and Hansel to help save the world's most beautiful people from a similar fate.
Title: Zoolander No. 2
